text: unhonne kaha, "ai saaleh! isase pahale too hamaare beech aisa vyakti tha jisase badee aashaen theen. kya too hamen unako poojane se rokata hai jinakee pooja hamaare baap-daada karate rahe hai? jinakee or too hamen bula raha hai usake vishay mein to hamen sandeh hai jo hamen duvidha mein daale hue hai.
